name: To Do Bubble Reporter Style Notebook
description:
My favorite type of notebook is the reporter style notebook and what better way to keep yourself organized than with a pretty, letterpressed reporter style jotter!

Letterpressed in soft peach ink onto a light butcher blue stock, it's bound with a pewter coil and contains 60 blank pages (120 front and back) for you to jot down all your to do lists and ideas.

Each notebook is lovingly hand printed on a Pilot Press. Since these are hand printed, slight variations in color and ink distribution occur.

***************************************
+ 3.5 x 5.25

+ Aged White Newsprint

+ Coil bound
+ Packaged in a cello sleeve

description:
While playing in the studio, I began an abstract design that worked itself into a notebook that's perfect for your own sketches, doodles or lists. I have millions of notebooks and I can't EVER have enough!

Letterpressed in neon red, mint and teal, the notebook is saddle-staple bound and has 40 speckled, aged white newsprint pages that are especially wonderful for sketching and silky smooth for any type of writing.

Each notebook is lovingly hand printed on a Pilot Press. Since these are hand printed, slight variations in color and ink distribution occur.

***************************************

name: Men's Letterpress Notecards with Printed Envelopes : Set of 25
description:
Elegant and distinguished.

Send your notes out in style with a simple and elegant letterpress stationery set. 

For notecards, type is hand set in your choice name, decorative initial or bold initials.

For envelopes, type is hand set in your choice of font (see last image for selection).

Makes a perfect gift for anyone, even as a treat for yourself!

*Sets pictured have envelopes set in 12pt Century Gothic and 8pt Copperplate, printed in Reflex Blue.

*************************************** 
+ A2 (4.25" x 5.5")
+ Set of 25 cards
+ Choice of Portrait or Landscape Orientation
+ Printed on 110lb Lettra 100% cotton paper 
+ Your choice of ink color from our selection (see last image) 
+ Your choice of typeface or Decorative Initial from our selection (see last image) 
+ Your choice of square flap envelopes in Kraft, White, Pearl or Olive
(If no choice is made, set will be sent with white square flap cotton envelopes)

*************************************** 
To order:

1. Please include choice of name, decorative initial or bold initials in notes to seller. 
2. Select typeface (initials are set in the same typeface for all).
3. Select ink color. 
4. Select Portrait or Landscape Orientation.
5. Select Corner or Center top location.
6. Select envelopes.

Makes a perfect gift for anyone, from a wonderful hostess to the beautiful bride-to-be. Even great as a treat for yourself! ;)

Each notecard is lovingly hand printed on a Pilot Press. Since these cards are hand printed, slight variations in color and ink distribution occur.

(If no choice is made, set will be sent with white square flap cotton envelopes)
